title: Tour de France Stage 7: Evenepoel Tears to TT Victory in ‘Big 4’ Showdown, Slashes Gap to Pogačar
content:
Evenepoel moves to 33 seconds back on Pogačar, Vingegaard resilient in first TT since injury, Roglič moves up to fourth overall.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 7: Evenepoel Tears to TT Victory in ‘Big 4’ Showdown, Slashes Gap to Pogačar on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
